# Topicals
When tending to external wounds, topical medications should be your first port of call. These can be used to stop bleeding, or to augment the speed at which wounds heal naturally.
## Brutes
A bruise pack can bandage and tend to all types of brute injuries at a moderate level.
A medicated suture can bandage and tend to all types of brute injuries.
Gauze can bandage and tend to lacerations and punctures, but is most effective on puncture wounds.
A simple suture can bandage and tend to lacerations and punctures, but is most effective on lacerations.
## Burns
Ointment can tend to burns of all types, but is less effective against caustic burns.
Regenerative meshes can tend burns of all types, including caustic burns.
Aloe cream can effectively tend to heat burns.
